bib.title: Analysing and predicting the adoption of anonymous transactions in cryptocurrencies
bib.author: Michalski, Rados{\l}aw
bib.abstract: With the appearance of cryptocurrencies more than ten years back, many have been thinking that it is rather a short-term novelty that would only interest few enthusiasts and die shortly after. The history, however, has shown that not only cryptocurrencies itself are alive, but also the blockchain technology started to be applied in a variety of domains. This success required the governments to take action with respect to implementing regulations in a number of areas and, as a result of that, apart from implementing Know Your Customer
bib.booktitle: International Conference on Business Information Systems
